actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to redesignate November 11 of each year as Veterans Day and to make such day a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Designates November 11 of each year as Veterans Day, effective January 1, 1978. Makes such day a legal public holiday. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103(a))

titles.title: A bill to redesignate November 11 of each year as Veterans Day and to make such day a legal public holiday.
